translations.wwa_h2_desc: At Skyz We Develop Visibility, Automation and Compliance Technologies for Large Scale Networks
translations.wwa_p_desc: Skyz is part of Sekom Group and also has a strategic partnership with Soitron, which has subsidiaries in seven European countries.
translations.visibility_desc: Todayâ€™s complex technology infrastructures often requires in depth expertise and advanced techniques to monitor and maintain
translations.automation_desc: Auto provisioning capabilities enable overcoming the challenges of complex and multi vendor infrastructres as well as benefiting from evolving Software Defined Technologies
translations.compliance_desc: In an interconnected world regulations are essential to secure networks and protect the rights of people
